abstract: Lawmakers in India vote to lower age at which person can be tried as adult from 18 to 16.
lead_paragraph: Indian lawmakers voted Tuesday to lower to 16 from 18 the age at which a person could be tried as an adult for crimes like murder and rape.

headline.main: India: Lawmakers Vote to Lower Age for Trying Some Teenagers as Adults
headline.print_headline: Asia; India: Lawmakers Vote to Lower Age for Trying Some Teenagers as Adults

snippet: Indian lawmakers voted Tuesday to lower to 16 from 18 the age at which a person could be tried as an adult for crimes like murder and rape.
